title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in after multiple password reset attempts. They report that the reset link works, but the new password is not being accepted when trying again. This issue prevents them from accessing their account entirely.

title: Payment Failure - Transaction Declined
description: Customer's card is being declined despite sufficient balance. They tried multiple times with different cards and still faced the same issue. The payment gateway shows an error code without explanation.

title: App Crashes on Launch
description: The mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on several Android devices. The customer has reinstalled the app multiple times without success. They cannot access any features due to this crash.

title: Delayed Email Notifications
description: Customer reports receiving notifications several hours late, making them miss important updates. They are particularly concerned about time-sensitive messages related to account security. The delay is inconsistent but frequent.

title: Unable to Update Profile
description: Profile changes are not being saved after submission. The customer tried updating their phone number address, and profile picture but nothing reflects in the account. They have cleared cache and cookies with no result.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: Customer is not receiving verification codes via SMS when logging in. They confirmed their phone number is correct and tried with another device. This prevents them from completing the login process.

title: Website Loading Slowly
description: Customer reports very slow load times on the main dashboard. Pages take up to a minute to load, making navigation extremely difficult. The issue occurs on multiple browsers and internet connections.

title: Order History Missing
description: Past orders are not showing up in the customer’s account despite being visible before. They checked multiple devices but the order history section appears blank. This creates concerns about tracking previous purchases.

title: App Logout Issue
description: Customer is logged out every time they close the app, even when the 'Stay signed in' option is selected. This forces them to log in repeatedly and slows down their workflow. They are frustrated with the constant re-authentication.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: Reset link expires before the customer has a chance to use it. Even when opened immediately, the system shows the link as invalid. The user has been unable to reset their password successfully.

title: Incorrect Billing Amount
description: Customer was charged double the subscription fee this month. Their billing history shows duplicate entries for the same payment date. They are requesting an immediate refund and clarification.

title: Feature Not Accessible
description: A premium feature remains locked despite the customer having an active subscription. They tried logging out and back in, but the feature still shows as unavailable. The issue is preventing them from using the service fully.

title: Incorrect Language Settings
description: App displays the wrong language despite correct settings being selected. The issue happens intermittently, switching between English and another language. This creates confusion while navigating the platform.

title: Error During Checkout
description: Customer receives an unknown error message when attempting to complete checkout. The error occurs after payment details are entered, preventing successful purchase. They are unable to finalize their order.

title: Data Sync Issues
description: Customer data is not syncing between web and mobile app versions. Updates made on one device do not appear on the other. This creates inconsistencies in their account information.

title: Push Notifications Disabled
description: Customer is no longer receiving push notifications from the app. They checked their device settings and confirmed notifications are enabled. Despite this, no alerts are being received.

title: Subscription Cancelled Unexpectedly
description: Customer’s active subscription shows as expired without any request from their side. Their payment method is valid and renewal was expected. They cannot access premium features due to this cancellation.

title: App Freezes on iOS
description: Several iOS users report the app freezing frequently during normal use. The freeze happens while navigating between pages and requires a force close. This disrupts their overall experience.

title: Missing Refund
description: Refund requested by the customer has not been reflected in their account after more than 7 days. They checked with their bank and found no pending transactions. They are demanding urgent action.

title: Search Function Not Working
description: Customer is unable to find products using the search bar. No results appear even for items that exist in the catalog. They rely on search for quick navigation and this slows them down.
